answer_html: False, because \(\left[ \begin{array}{cc} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 \end{array} \right]\) has a repeated eigenvalue of 1 and is diagonalized by \(I\)
answer_latex:
False, because $\left[ \begin{array}{cc}
1 & 0 \\
0 & 1
\end{array} \right]$ has a repeated eigenvalue of 1 and is diagonalized
by $I$
question: 2 (c)

statement_html: TRUE or FALSE: If a square matrix has repeated eigenvalues, then it cannot be diagonalized. Justify your answer.
